title: Turmeric Carrot Detox Soup
directions: Saut√© finely diced onion, together with grated ginger. Add roughly (2cm) diced carrot and root parsley and fry. Then add stock, lemon juice, turmeric and salt and pepper to taste. Cook for 30 mins.
Wilt spinach with finely diced garlic on a bit of the vegetable stock.
Once soup is cooked, blend everything and serve with the wilted spinach and yoghurt.
ingredients: juice from half of a lemon
